text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump Yes, that's why America has the greatest number of deaths from #COVID19 --- because he "put us first" as he bailed out airlines that should fail & bailed out large corporations that didn't need the money & should have failed bcuz apparently they hadn't managed their $$ properly.
